title: I hit level 29 without the game telling me I hit level 29
body: When I entered a game, it said I was level 28, this game that I was entering was the game that would allow me to go to level 29 no matter how long the match took. After the match I was level 29 with some exp already plus the exp gained from playing the match....which confused me because I didn't get the notification or capsule for leveling up. Feels Bad Man, just trying to grind BE, can someone help me with this? Oh also I also tried to make a ticket on the support site and it says I needed to login to make a ticket, but I was already logged in and when I try to login in using the link it gives me it says error. Any ideas?

replies.body: No worries, I gotchu fam. Been seeing this weird issue with levelup rewards over the past few days, but luckily I can line up the xp gains and see where you should have gotten this one. Double check your loot now ^_^
